subject: Boxing
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Freddie Roach had an eight-year career as a boxer, but it was not until two years after he retired, in 1988, that he started feeling the symptoms of Parkinson’s syndrome.
snippet: Freddie Roach had an eight-year career as a boxer, but it was not until two years after he retired, in 1988, that he started feeling the symptoms of Parkinson’s syndrome.
